00047 
00048 typedef struct mongo_host_port {
00049     char host[255];
00050     int port;
00051     struct mongo_host_port* next;
00052 } mongo_host_port;
00053 
00054 typedef struct {
00055     mongo_host_port* seeds; /*< The list of seed nodes provided by the user. */
00056     mongo_host_port* hosts; /*< The list of host and ports reported by the replica set */
00057     char* name;             /*< The name of the replica set. */
00058     bson_bool_t primary_connected; /*< Whether we've managed to connect to a primary node. */
00059 } mongo_replset;
00060 
00061 typedef struct {
00062     mongo_host_port* primary;
00063     mongo_replset* replset;
00064     int sock;
00065     bson_bool_t connected;
00066     mongo_exception_context exception;
00067 } mongo_connection;
00068 
00069 #pragma pack(1)
00070 typedef struct {
00071     int len;
00072     int id;
00073     int responseTo;
00074     int op;
00075 } mongo_header;
00076 
00077 typedef struct {
00078     mongo_header head;
00079     char data;
00080 } mongo_message;
00081 
00082 typedef struct {
00083     int flag; /* non-zero on failure */
00084     int64_t cursorID;
00085     int start;
00086     int num;
00087 } mongo_reply_fields;
00088 
00089 typedef struct {
00090     mongo_header head;
00091     mongo_reply_fields fields;
00092     char objs;
00093 } mongo_reply;
00094 #pragma pack()
00095 
00096 typedef struct {
00097     mongo_reply * mm; /* message is owned by cursor */
00098     mongo_connection * conn; /* connection is *not* owned by cursor */
00099     const char* ns; /* owned by cursor */
00100     bson current;
00101 } mongo_cursor;
00102 
00103 enum mongo_operations {
00104     mongo_op_msg = 1000,    /* generic msg command followed by a string */
00105     mongo_op_update = 2001, /* update object */
00106     mongo_op_insert = 2002,
00107     mongo_op_query = 2004,
00108     mongo_op_get_more = 2005,
00109     mongo_op_delete = 2006,
00110     mongo_op_kill_cursors = 2007
00111 };

00122     mongo_conn_not_master, /* leaves conn connected to slave */
00123     mongo_conn_bad_set_name, /* The provided replica set name doesn't match the existing replica set */
00124     mongo_conn_cannot_find_primary
00125 } mongo_conn_return;
